page.title: 13A WEEKEND IN SHERE
page.content: On Sunday I went to St.James'Church in Shere and I took my doll. It was Mothering Sunday and there was a Christening. When Rector and the baby's family were all by the font, the Rector put the holy water in the sign of a cross on the baby's head. The baby was christened Catherine and she wanted to go right into the font, this made everybody laugh. Rector asked us to pick up the christening card and we had to say a special prayer. Jillian who is six years old took the candle after her sister had been christened. The Rector came behind Jillian with the baby in his arms. One of the songs we sang was 'I danced in the morning'. Then all the children in the church went up to get posies of flowers for their mothers. By Sarah Druce aged 8years.
